story.title: Our Story
story.content: BioLabData was created with one goal - to make quality biostatistics accessible to every researcher. We combine years of experience in data analysis with modern technologies to deliver fast and reliable results.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To transform your data into meaningful scientific discoveries. We believe every researcher deserves access to professional statistical support.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Contact us for a free consultation

footer.description: Professional statistical analysis for scientific research and medical publications.

q1.question: How long does the analysis take?
q1.answer: Standard analysis takes 5-10 business days depending on complexity. We offer express service for urgent projects.

q2.question: What data formats do you accept?
q2.answer: We work with Excel, CSV, SPSS, Stata and other standard formats. If you have data in another format, contact us.

q3.question: Do you provide consultations before analysis?
q3.answer: Yes, the initial consultation is free. We discuss your needs and suggest the most appropriate approach.

q4.question: What do I get as a final result?
q4.answer: You receive a complete report with tables, charts, statistical results and written interpretation, ready for inclusion in a dissertation or publication.

q5.question: Do you do revisions?
q5.answer: Yes, we include free revisions if there are comments from a supervisor or reviewers.
